formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'HasVoicemail' =-
[Synopsis] Conditionally branches to priority + 101 with the right options set
[Description] HasVoicemail(vmbox[/folder][@context][|varname[|options]]) Optionally sets <varname> to the number of messages in that folder. Assumes folder of INBOX if not specified. The option string may contain zero or the following character: 'j' -- jump to priority n+101, if there is voicemail in the folder indicated. This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: HASVMSTATUS The result of the voicemail check returned as a text string as follows <# of messages in the folder, 0 for NONE>
This application has been deprecated in favor of the VMCOUNT() function

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -11,3 +11,5 @@ This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: HASVMSTATUS The result of the voicemail check returned as a text string as follows <# of messages in the folder, 0 for NONE> + + This application has been deprecated in favor of the VMCOUNT() function
